body:
gotcha(ver0.0.2) install fail the following message:

We also need to patch gotcha(ver0.0.2).
```
 >> 50    /tmp/denpo/spack-stage/spack-stage-gotcha-0.0.2-67l4fo2kvb2gd64u4m5owx3mwxayzhom/spack-src/src/libc_wrappers.
           c:354:21: error: 'SYS_open' undeclared (first use in this function); did you mean 'SYS_openat'?
     51        result = syscall(SYS_open, pathname, flags, mode);
     52                         ^~~~~~~~
     53                         SYS_openat
     54    /tmp/denpo/spack-stage/spack-stage-gotcha-0.0.2-67l4fo2kvb2gd64u4m5owx3mwxayzhom/spack-src/src/libc_wrappers.
           c:354:21: note: each undeclared identifier is reported only once for each function it appears in
  >> 55    make[2]: *** [src/CMakeFiles/gotcha.dir/build.make:125: src/CMakeFiles/gotcha.dir/libc_wrappers.c.o] Error 1
     56    make[2]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
     57    make[2]: Leaving directory '/tmp/denpo/spack-stage/spack-stage-gotcha-0.0.2-67l4fo2kvb2gd64u4m5owx3mwxayzhom/
           spack-build'
  >> 58    make[1]: *** [CMakeFiles/Makefile2:201: src/CMakeFiles/gotcha.dir/all] Error 2
     59    make[1]: Leaving directory '/tmp/denpo/spack-stage/spack-stage-gotcha-0.0.2-67l4fo2kvb2gd64u4m5owx3mwxayzhom/
           spack-build'
     60    make: *** [Makefile:153: all] Error 2
```
title: ver 0.0.2 fixed to build on ARM
